results.description: BBC Scotland speaks to Preston North End manager Alex Neil on success, dedication and the future of Scottish coaches in England.
results.title: Alex Neil: Preston manager on his will to work and win

results.description: Leeds United goalkeeper Kiko Casilla is granted extra time to respond to allegations that he racially abused Charlton Athletic's Jonathan Leko.
results.shortTitle: Casilla gets more time for racism charge
results.title: Kiko Casilla: Leeds United goalkeeper given extra time to respond to racism allegations

results.description: Cardiff City chairman Mehmet Dalman says the club expect to appoint a replacement for sacked manager Neil Warnock 'within 72 hours'.
results.shortTitle: New Cardiff boss by weekend - Dalman
results.title: Cardiff City: Boss could be named within 72 hours, says chairman Mehmet Dalman

results.description: Cardiff City part company with manager Neil Warnock after more than three years with the Championship club.
results.title: Neil Warnock: Manager leaves Cardiff City after three years

results.description: Bristol City are the first visiting side to win at Cardiff City this season thanks to a spectacular goal from Josh Brownhill.
results.title: Cardiff City 0-1 Bristol City

results.description: Hull City midfielder Jon Toral will be out for about three months after having knee surgery.
results.title: Jon Toral: Hull City midfielder out for about three months after knee surgery

results.description: Michael O'Neill says Stoke's 4-2 win against Barnsley in his first game in charge was a "great start" after having little time to prepare.
results.title: Barnsley 2-4 Stoke City: Michael O'Neill makes winning start as Stoke boss

results.description: Jake Livermore scores the winner as West Brom stay top of the Championship with a resilient victory over in-form Hull City.
results.title: Hull City 0-1 West Bromwich Albion: Jake Livermore goal keeps Baggies top

results.description: Matt Smith's late header sees Millwall beat south London rivals Charlton Athletic at The Den.
results.shortTitle: Smith scores late winner for Millwall
results.title: Millwall 2-1 Charlton: Matt Smith's late header seals win for Lions

results.description: Aleksandar Mitrovic punishes keeper Lee Camp's error as Fulham win at Birmingham City in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Fulham beat Birmingham after Camp error
results.title: Birmingham 0-1 Fulham: Lee Camp error hands win to visitors

thumbnail.altText: Fulham striker Aleksandar Mitrovic - the Championship's top scorer - has now netted 12 goals this season

results.description: Goals from Bryan Mbeumo, Kamohelo Mokotjo and Josh Dasilva lift Brentford into ninth in the Championship as they overcome Wigan.
results.shortTitle: Brentford cruise to victory at Wigan
results.title: Wigan Athletic 0-3 Brentford: Bees climb to ninth place

thumbnail.altText: Mbeumo has scored three times in his last five appearances

results.description: Britt Assombalonga ends Middlesbrough's goal drought with a double as they fight back to claim a point at Loftus Road.
results.shortTitle: Assombalonga brace earns point for Boro
results.title: QPR 2-2 Middlesbrough: Britt Assombalonga double secures draw for Boro

thumbnail.altText: Assombalonga is Boro's leading scorer with six goals this season

results.description: Patrick Bamford scores his first goal since August as promotion-chasing Leeds United hold out for victory over Blackburn.
results.shortTitle: Bamford ends goal drought as Leeds win
results.title: Leeds United 2-1 Blackburn Rovers: Patrick Bamford scores for first time since August as hosts win

results.description: Promotion hopefuls Preston end Huddersfield's seven-match unbeaten run with a comfortable home win the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Preston cruise to win over Huddersfield
results.title: Preston North End 3-1 Huddersfield Town: Promotion hopefuls end Terriers' unbeaten run

thumbnail.altText: Alan Browne scores Preston's second goal

results.description: Reading continue their resurgence under new manager Mark Bowen as they easily beat Luton Town.
results.title: Reading 3-0 Luton Town: Mark Bowen continues Royals' resurgence with third win in four

thumbnail.altText: Ovie Ejaria celebrates a goal for Reading

results.description: Two injury time goals ensured a draw in this pulsating match at Hillsborough.
results.shortTitle: Wilmot rescues point for Swansea against Owls
results.title: Sheffield Wednesday 2-2 Swansea City: Two injury time goals in draw

results.description: Lewis Grabban takes advantage of a Derby County error to give Nottingham Forest victory over their local rivals.
results.shortTitle: Grabban nets Forest winner against Rams
results.title: Nottingham Forest 1-0 Derby County: Lewis Grabban scores winner for hosts

thumbnail.altText: Nottingham Forest celebrate Lewis Grabban's goal

results.description: Poland international midfielder Mateusz Klich signs a new four-and-a-half-year contract with Championship club Leeds United.
results.shortTitle: Klich agrees new long-term Leeds deal
results.title: Mateusz Klich: Poland midfielder signs new long-term deal with Leeds United
